settings.title: THANK YOU
settings.text: At Primitive Choice, I strive to provide you a wide variety of high quality meat products so that you can nourish your pet with the  best diet on the planet, all while staying on a reasonably priced budget. Thank you for supporting a small business!
Subscribe to get special offer codes, free giveaways, price drops, new item alerts and more!

settings.title: Earn rewards
settings.text: Did you know you can earn points for for simply shopping at Primitive Choice?! All you have to do is create an account when you checkout. Your points start accumulating on your very first order!

settings.title: SHIPPING
settings.raw_content:
• ALL orders are currently being shipped on the closest following Monday even if the order is placed Friday - Sunday. This stands unless otherwise posted. Excludes any sales.
• If you need the order to be held, you must notate this in the notes section when you place your order.
• Shipping is available to the entire continental US, with transit times varying 1 to 4 days. 
• There is a hard 15 pound minimum on all raw meat orders.
• The minimum strictly only includes raw items and not any dry goods.
• Please do not choose the dry goods shipping rate if your box includes any raw meat at all.
• It is recommend to order 56-pound boxes in order to receive the best shipping rate.
• Please place your order at least 5 business days in advanced from when you need your order to ship. Orders ONLY ship out on Monday.
• There is no order minimum if you are solely purchasing dry goods. However, if your order includes any raw meat in addition to dry goods, then you must meet the 15-pound minimum. 
• There is no minimum or maximum order for local pick ups - regardless of order size there will be a $5 pick up fee. Pick-ups take place on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 5-6pm.
• For more information regarding shipping and pick-up, please visit the FAQ page.

settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.richtext:
Primitive Choice proudly supports the USA by sourcing the meat, shop equipment and all packaging supplies right from home!

The vast majority of the meat products are born, raised and harvested right here in the USA. A select product is from Canada while another is from New Zealand and one from Australia in order to provide a superior product.

settings.title: continental us shipping
settings.text: No matter where you live in the Continental US, a truck with your box full of meat will make it to your front door in 4 days or less once it ships from Colorado.

settings.title: FLEXIBLE local pickup
settings.text: Those customers living close to Primitive Choice may choose to pick up their order instead of shipping it. The pick up location is in Fountain, CO 80817.

settings.title: cross country shipping & local colorado pickup
LOCAL SOURCING
settings.richtext:
Primitive Choice is pleased to source the wide variety of the provided meat products from local farms right here in Colorado.


I have personally selected to work with these individual farms based on their superior level of sustainability and ethics behind the treatment of their animals.

settings.title: trust in our suppliers
settings.richtext:
The vast majority of the meat products are proudly sourced in the USA. One select product is from Canada while another is from New Zealand and Australia  in order to provide a superior product.

All seafood and fish are wild-caught, never farmed-raised.

Hand crafted and responsibly sourced

settings.title: POINTS & REWARDS
settings.text: You can now earn points for every dollar you spend at Primitive Choice! Simply click on the box "earn rewards" in the lower right hand corner of this window and create an account for your points automatically start accumulating!

settings.title: WE SUPPORT SMALL BUSINESSES
settings.text: Primitive Choice was founded in 2017 with the goal of becoming an online one stop show for raw food and pet supplies not sold in stores. My vision is to sell products that I personally use for my pets that come from other small businesses.

settings.title: EVERY DOG BREED
settings.text: Raw feeding is not just for the big dogs or certain breeds, it is for every dog from chihuahuas to a great danes. One thing to remember is to match the size of edible bones to the dog that you are feeding.

settings.title: CATS OF ALL SIZES
settings.text: Did you know your feline craves a raw diet just as much as your canine?! Your cat is ready to pounce on the opportunity to nourish their true nature. While they can be trickier to transition, there are tips to help!

settings.title: PUPPIES & KITTENS
settings.text: There is only one main difference between raw feeding adult pets and growing youngsters; and that is that their meals have to be completely balanced every single day versus say over a weeks time.

settings.title: YOUR PETS CRAVE A SPECIES APPROPRIATE RAW DIET
longer lifespan
settings.text:
"My dog has been eating a balanced raw food
diet since she was 5 years old. She just turned 12 and is going strong as if she was 6"

settings.title: far fewer vet visits
settings.text: "Ever since switching to a raw food diet 4 years ago, my pets have not been to the vet due to any type of health complication. That says a lot!"

settings.title: pearly white teeth
settings.text: "My 3 year old had teeth of a 13 year old when he was on kibble. Within the first few months of feeding raw his teeth became nearly perfectly clean!"

settings.text: Share blog posts, products, or promotions with your customers. Use this text to describe products, share details on availability and style, or as a space to display recent reviews or FAQs.

settings.title: agility dog on a raw diet
settings.richtext:
By far THE BEST online raw food supplier I've dealt with! I run my dogs in agility and I know I want them to perform at their peak performance, and I knew feeding them raw was the only way to go to get those results! I contacted Primitive Choice with my first order and it was a BREEZE! Super helpful and if I ever have any questions they are answered immediately. My dogs love the variety I am able to get! The quality of their products are second to non and I plan on placing many more orders! I also like the fact that if I'm in their area I can pick up the items instead of shipping them! Again, if you want to best, go with Primitive Choice!!!!

@agility_nerd, Wyoming

settings.title: SO GLAD I FOUND PRIMITIVE CHOICE
settings.richtext:
When we first moved to Denver, we decided to switch our two dogs to a prey model raw diet. One of the hardest things was finding all the different things that we needed to put into their diet - going to random grocery stores, butchers, and ordering from different online retailers was just a pain in the butt making me wonder if I had made the right decision. I knew this was the diet I wanted to keep my dogs on, but wished more than anything I could find one affordable place where I could purchase ALL the different bone, meats, and organs we needed. I was SO happy when I first found out about Primitive Choice, and soon made my first order. I decided to make the drive up to Loveland to pick up, and had the chance to meet Shea who was sooo friendly and sweet. She has been a huge help and has been amazing the whole time we have been customers. The meats are quality, affordable, and not to mention my dogs LOVE everything we have gotten from Primitive Choice. We feel so lucky to have found such an awesome local business that lets us feed our dogs the way they were meant to eat!!!

@tuckerleo_da_huskies, Colorado

settings.title: my picky eater eats everything
settings.richtext:
Feeding our dog raw has been a journey. He was PICKY!!! We completely took him off kibble about a year ago and substituted it with frozen raw and freeze dried foods. After further research, I knew I wanted him completely on raw meals so I started looking into raw feeding sites. There are so many out there but Primitive Choice was recommended to me so I gave it a try and I couldn’t be happier with their service. Shae-la is amazing! Her packaging is great, it maintains everything inside nice and frozen. Her prices are fair and her customer service tops it all off! Always so helpful and willing to work with you if you were to have a special request. Overall a great company!

@drogontheamazing, Oregon

settings.title: PRIMITIVE CHOICE CUSTOMER FOR LIFE
settings.richtext:
Shea-la has provided me with such outstanding customer service since day one! I will not shop for raw on any other website, honestly. Price wise and quality wise, none compare! When I said customer for life, I meant it!

@rawfedbully, Montana

Got the variety pack of dehydrated treats and they're fabulous! My dog loves them and best of all, I trust the product 100%. Happy customer and pup--we will be buying more! Thank you!

@grisby.the.giant, California

settings.title: OVER THE MOON HAPPY
settings.richtext:
Just got the first order today and our Arrow was all over it and wanted to chow down! I would give more than 5 stars if there was a way! Excellent customer service as I asked for some favors prior to my order and they were super flexible and made things happen. I love how the box is neatly done and secure for transport and the items were all individually wrapped so I can just throw them in the freezer. No hassle no mess! Wish I had a place to post pics here but I’ll post it on the visitors posting page. Can’t wait for our boy to try them!

@siberianhuskyarrow, California
